verses.verse: וַיֹּסִ֙פוּ֙ <S%H3254><s%> again בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> did הָרַ֖ע <S%H7451><s%> evil בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְאֵה֖וּד <S%H164><s%> when Ehud מֵֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> was dead

וַיִּמְכְּרֵ֣ם <S%H4376><s%> sold יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD בְּיַד֙ <S%H3027><s%> them into the hand יָבִ֣ין <S%H2985><s%> of Jabin מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king כְּנַ֔עַן <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who מָלַ֖ךְ <S%H4427><s%> that reigned בְּחָצ֑וֹר <S%H2674><s%> in Hazor וְשַׂר־ <S%H8269><s%> the captain צְבָאוֹ֙ <S%H6635><s%> of whose host סִֽיסְרָ֔א <S%H5516><s%> [was] Sisera וְה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יוֹשֵׁ֖ב <S%H3427><s%> which dwelt בַּחֲרֹ֥שֶׁת <S%H2800><s%> in Harosheth הַגּוֹיִֽם׃ <S%H1471><s%> of the Gentiles

וַיִּצְעֲק֥וּ <S%H6817><s%> cried בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> for תְּשַׁ֨ע <S%H8672><s%> for he had nine מֵא֤וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred רֶֽכֶב־ <S%H7393><s%> chariots בַּרְזֶל֙ <S%H1270><s%> of iron ל֔וֹ וְ֠הוּא <S%H1931><s%> and he לָחַ֞ץ <S%H3905><s%> oppressed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵ֧י <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בְּחָזְקָ֖ה <S%H2394><s%> he mightily עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> and twenty שָׁנָֽה׃ <S%H8141><s%> years ס

וּדְבוֹרָה֙ <S%H1683><s%> And Deborah אִשָּׁ֣ה <S%H802><s%> the wife נְבִיאָ֔ה <S%H5031><s%> a prophetess אֵ֖שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> the wife לַפִּיד֑וֹת <S%H3941><s%> of Lapidoth הִ֛יא <S%H1931><s%> he שֹׁפְטָ֥ה <S%H8199><s%> she judged אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel בָּעֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> at that time הַהִֽיא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

וְ֠הִיא <S%H1931><s%> he יוֹשֶׁ֨בֶת <S%H3427><s%> And she dwelt תַּֽחַת־ <S%H8478><s%> under תֹּ֜מֶר <S%H8560><s%> under the palm tree דְּבוֹרָ֗ה <S%H1683><s%> of Deborah בֵּ֧ין <S%H996><s%> between הָרָמָ֛ה <S%H7414><s%> between Ramah וּבֵ֥ין <S%H996><s%> between בֵּֽית־ אֵ֖ל <S%H1008><s%> and Bethel בְּהַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> in mount אֶפְרָ֑יִם <S%H669><s%> Ephraim וַיַּעֲל֥וּ <S%H5927><s%> came up אֵלֶ֛יהָ <S%H413><s%> and to בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> and the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לַמִּשְׁפָּֽט׃ <S%H4941><s%> to her for judgment

וַתִּשְׁלַ֗ח <S%H7971><s%> And she sent וַתִּקְרָא֙ <S%H7121><s%> and called לְבָרָ֣ק <S%H1301><s%> Barak בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֲבִינֹ֔עַם <S%H42><s%> of Abinoam מִקֶּ֖דֶשׁ <S%H6943><s%> out of Kedeshnaphtali נַפְתָּלִ֑י <S%H5321><s%> of Naphtali וַתֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said אֵלָ֜יו <S%H413><s%> to him הֲלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> Behold צִוָּ֣ה ׀ <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> unto him Hath not the LORD אֱלֹהֵֽי־ <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לֵ֤ךְ <S%H1980><s%> Go וּמָֽשַׁכְתָּ֙ <S%H4900><s%> and draw בְּהַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> toward mount תָּב֔וֹר <S%H8396><s%> Tabor וְלָקַחְתָּ֣ <S%H3947><s%> and take עִמְּךָ֗ <S%H5973><s%> you עֲשֶׂ֤רֶת <S%H6235><s%> with thee ten אֲלָפִים֙ <S%H505><s%> thousand אִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> men מִבְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> of the children נַפְתָּלִ֖י <S%H5321><s%> of Naphtali וּמִבְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> and of the children זְבֻלֽוּן׃ <S%H2074><s%> of Zebulun

וּמָשַׁכְתִּ֨י <S%H4900><s%> And I will draw אֵלֶ֜יךָ <S%H413><s%> about אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about נַ֣חַל <S%H5158><s%> unto thee to the river קִישׁ֗וֹן <S%H7028><s%> Kishon אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> סִֽיסְרָא֙ <S%H5516><s%> Sisera שַׂר־ <S%H8269><s%> the captain צְבָ֣א <S%H6635><s%> army יָבִ֔ין <S%H2985><s%> of Jabin's וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רִכְבּ֖וֹ <S%H7393><s%> with his chariots וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הֲמוֹנ֑וֹ <S%H1995><s%> and his multitude וּנְתַתִּ֖יהוּ <S%H5414><s%> and I will deliver בְּיָדֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3027><s%> him into thine hand

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֵלֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H413><s%> then בָּרָ֔ק <S%H1301><s%> And Barak אִם־ <S%H518><s%> to her If תֵּלְכִ֥י <S%H1980><s%> with me then I will go עִמִּ֖י <S%H5973><s%> with וְהָלָ֑כְתִּי <S%H1980><s%> will go וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> you will not תֵלְכִ֛י <S%H1980><s%> go עִמִּ֖י <S%H5973><s%> with לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> I will not אֵלֵֽךְ׃ <S%H1980><s%> go

וַתֹּ֜אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And she said הָלֹ֧ךְ <S%H1980><s%> I will surely אֵלֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> that thou takest עִמָּ֗ךְ <S%H5973><s%> thee אֶ֚פֶס <S%H657><s%> with thee notwithstanding כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֨א <S%H3808><s%> not תִֽהְיֶ֜ה <S%H1961><s%> become תִּֽפְאַרְתְּךָ֗ <S%H8597><s%> shall not be for thine honour עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַדֶּ֙רֶךְ֙ <S%H1870><s%> the journey אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> you are about הוֹלֵ֔ךְ <S%H1980><s%> to take כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> into בְֽיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> into the hand אִשָּׁ֔ה <S%H802><s%> of a woman יִמְכֹּ֥ר <S%H4376><s%> shall sell יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> סִֽיסְרָ֑א <S%H5516><s%> Sisera וַתָּ֧קָם <S%H6965><s%> arose דְּבוֹרָ֛ה <S%H1683><s%> And Deborah וַתֵּ֥לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> and went עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with בָּרָ֖ק <S%H1301><s%> with Barak קֶֽדְשָׁה׃ <S%H6943><s%> to Kedesh

וַיַּזְעֵ֨ק <S%H2199><s%> called בָּרָ֜ק <S%H1301><s%> And Barak אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> זְבוּלֻ֤ן <S%H2074><s%> Zebulun וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נַפְתָּלִי֙ <S%H5321><s%> and Naphtali קֶ֔דְשָׁה <S%H6943><s%> to Kedesh וַיַּ֣עַל <S%H5927><s%> and he went up בְּרַגְלָ֔יו <S%H7272><s%> at his feet עֲשֶׂ֥רֶת <S%H6235><s%> with ten אַלְפֵ֖י <S%H505><s%> thousand אִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> men וַתַּ֥עַל <S%H5927><s%> went up עִמּ֖וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with דְּבוֹרָֽה׃ <S%H1683><s%> and Deborah

וְחֶ֤בֶר <S%H2268><s%> Now Heber הַקֵּינִי֙ <S%H7017><s%> the Kenite נִפְרָ֣ד <S%H6504><s%> had severed מִקַּ֔יִן <S%H7017><s%> himself from the Kenites מִבְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> [which was] of the children חֹבָ֖ב <S%H2246><s%> of Hobab חֹתֵ֣ן <S%H2859><s%> the father in law מֹשֶׁ֑ה <S%H4872><s%> of Moses וַיֵּ֣ט <S%H5186><s%> and pitched אָהֳל֔וֹ <S%H168><s%> his tent עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far אֵל֥וֹן <S%H436><s%> unto the plain [בַּצְעַנִּים כ] (בְּצַעֲנַנִּ֖ים <S%H6815><s%> Zaannannim ק) אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> is near קֶֽדֶשׁ׃ <S%H6943><s%> which [is] by Kedesh

וַיַּגִּ֖דוּ <S%H5046><s%> And they shewed לְסִֽיסְרָ֑א <S%H5516><s%> Sisera כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for עָלָ֛ה <S%H5927><s%> was gone up בָּרָ֥ק <S%H1301><s%> that Barak בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֲבִינֹ֖עַם <S%H42><s%> of Abinoam הַר־ <S%H2022><s%> to mount תָּבֽוֹר׃ <S%H8396><s%> Tabor ס

וַיַּזְעֵ֨ק <S%H2199><s%> gathered together סִֽיסְרָ֜א <S%H5516><s%> And Sisera אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all רִכְבּ֗וֹ <S%H7393><s%> all his chariots תְּשַׁ֤ע <S%H8672><s%> [even] nine מֵאוֹת֙ <S%H3967><s%> hundred רֶ֣כֶב <S%H7393><s%> chariots בַּרְזֶ֔ל <S%H1270><s%> of iron וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> and all the people אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who אִתּ֑וֹ <S%H854><s%> from מֵחֲרֹ֥שֶׁת <S%H2800><s%> that [were] with him from Harosheth הַגּוֹיִ֖ם <S%H1471><s%> of the Gentiles אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to נַ֥חַל <S%H5158><s%> unto the river קִישֽׁוֹן׃ <S%H7028><s%> of Kishon

וַתֹּאמֶר֩ <S%H559><s%> said דְּבֹרָ֨ה <S%H1683><s%> And Deborah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בָּרָ֜ק <S%H1301><s%> unto Barak ק֗וּם <S%H6965><s%> Up כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> For זֶ֤ה <S%H2088><s%> this הַיּוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> for this [is] the day אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> which נָתַ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> hath delivered יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> in which the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> סִֽיסְרָא֙ <S%H5516><s%> Sisera בְּיָדֶ֔ךָ <S%H3027><s%> into thine hand הֲלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> behold יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> is not the LORD יָצָ֣א <S%H3318><s%> gone out לְפָנֶ֑יךָ <S%H6440><s%> before וַיֵּ֤רֶד <S%H3381><s%> went down בָּרָק֙ <S%H1301><s%> thee? So Barak מֵהַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> from mount תָּב֔וֹר <S%H8396><s%> Tabor וַעֲשֶׂ֧רֶת <S%H6235><s%> and ten אֲלָפִ֛ים <S%H505><s%> thousand אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> men אַחֲרָֽיו׃ <S%H310><s%> after

וַיָּ֣הָם <S%H2000><s%> discomfited יְ֠הוָה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> סִֽיסְרָ֨א <S%H5516><s%> Sisera וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הָרֶ֧כֶב <S%H7393><s%> and all [his] chariots וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֛ה <S%H4264><s%> and all [his] host לְפִי־ <S%H6310><s%> with the edge חֶ֖רֶב <S%H2719><s%> of the sword לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before בָרָ֑ק <S%H1301><s%> Barak וַיֵּ֧רֶד <S%H3381><s%> lighted down סִֽיסְרָ֛א <S%H5516><s%> so that Sisera מֵעַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> and הַמֶּרְכָּבָ֖ה <S%H4818><s%> off [his] chariot וַיָּ֥נָס <S%H5127><s%> and fled away בְּרַגְלָֽיו׃ <S%H7272><s%> on his feet

וּבָרָ֗ק <S%H1301><s%> But Barak רָדַ֞ף <S%H7291><s%> pursued אַחֲרֵ֤י <S%H310><s%> after הָרֶ֙כֶב֙ <S%H7393><s%> the chariots וְאַחֲרֵ֣י <S%H310><s%> And הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֔ה <S%H4264><s%> and after the host עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> far חֲרֹ֣שֶׁת <S%H2800><s%> unto Harosheth הַגּוֹיִ֑ם <S%H1471><s%> of the Gentiles וַיִּפֹּ֞ל <S%H5307><s%> fell כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all מַחֲנֵ֤ה <S%H4264><s%> and all the host סִֽיסְרָא֙ <S%H5516><s%> of Sisera לְפִי־ <S%H6310><s%> upon the edge חֶ֔רֶב <S%H2719><s%> of the sword לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not נִשְׁאַ֖ר <S%H7604><s%> left עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> even אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> [and] there was not a man

וְסִֽיסְרָא֙ <S%H5516><s%> Howbeit Sisera נָ֣ס <S%H5127><s%> fled away בְּרַגְלָ֔יו <S%H7272><s%> on his feet אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> to the tent יָעֵ֔ל <S%H3278><s%> of Jael אֵ֖שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> the wife חֶ֣בֶר <S%H2268><s%> of Heber הַקֵּינִ֑י <S%H7017><s%> the Kenite כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for שָׁל֗וֹם <S%H7965><s%> for [there was] peace בֵּ֚ין <S%H996><s%> between יָבִ֣ין <S%H2985><s%> between Jabin מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> the king חָצ֔וֹר <S%H2674><s%> of Hazor וּבֵ֕ין <S%H996><s%> between בֵּ֖ית <S%H1004><s%> and the house חֶ֥בֶר <S%H2268><s%> of Heber הַקֵּינִֽי׃ <S%H7017><s%> the Kenite

וַתֵּצֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> went out יָעֵל֮ <S%H3278><s%> And Jael לִקְרַ֣את <S%H7125><s%> to meet סִֽיסְרָא֒ <S%H5516><s%> Sisera וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> to him סוּרָ֧ה <S%H5493><s%> unto him Turn in אֲדֹנִ֛י <S%H113><s%> my lord סוּרָ֥ה <S%H5493><s%> turn in אֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> about אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּירָ֑א <S%H3372><s%> to me fear וַיָּ֤סַר <S%H5493><s%> not And when he had turned in אֵלֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H413><s%> to her הָאֹ֔הֱלָה <S%H168><s%> unto her into the tent וַתְּכַסֵּ֖הוּ <S%H3680><s%> she covered בַּשְּׂמִיכָֽה׃ <S%H8063><s%> him with a mantle

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אֵלֶ֛יהָ <S%H413><s%> about הַשְׁקִינִי־ <S%H8248><s%> to drink נָ֥א <S%H4994><s%> to her Please מְעַט־ <S%H4592><s%> unto her Give me I pray thee a little מַ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> water כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for צָמֵ֑אתִי <S%H6770><s%> for I am thirsty וַתִּפְתַּ֞ח <S%H6605><s%> And she opened אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נֹ֧אוד <S%H4997><s%> a bottle הֶחָלָ֛ב <S%H2461><s%> of milk וַתַּשְׁקֵ֖הוּ <S%H8248><s%> and gave him drink וַתְּכַסֵּֽהוּ׃ <S%H3680><s%> and covered

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Again he said אֵלֶ֔יהָ <S%H413><s%> to her עֲמֹ֖ד <S%H5975><s%> unto her Stand in פֶּ֣תַח <S%H6607><s%> the door הָאֹ֑הֶל <S%H168><s%> of the tent וְהָיָה֩ <S%H1961><s%> become אִם־ <S%H518><s%> shall be if אִ֨ישׁ <S%H376><s%> and it shall be when any man יָב֜וֹא <S%H935><s%> doth come וּשְׁאֵלֵ֗ךְ <S%H7592><s%> and enquire וְאָמַ֛ר <S%H559><s%> of thee and say הֲיֵֽשׁ־ <S%H3426><s%> is there פֹּ֥ה <S%H6311><s%> here אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> any man וְאָמַ֥רְתְּ <S%H559><s%> and says אָֽיִן׃ <S%H369><s%> else

וַתִּקַּ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> took יָעֵ֣ל <S%H3278><s%> Then Jael אֵֽשֶׁת־ <S%H802><s%> wife חֶ֠בֶר <S%H2268><s%> Heber's אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְתַ֨ד <S%H3489><s%> a nail הָאֹ֜הֶל <S%H168><s%> of the tent וַתָּ֧שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> and took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמַּקֶּ֣בֶת <S%H4718><s%> an hammer בְּיָדָ֗הּ <S%H3027><s%> in her hand וַתָּב֤וֹא <S%H935><s%> and went אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> about בַּלָּ֔אט <S%H3909><s%> secretly וַתִּתְקַ֤ע <S%H8628><s%> unto him and smote אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיָּתֵד֙ <S%H3489><s%> the nail בְּרַקָּת֔וֹ <S%H7541><s%> into his temples וַתִּצְנַ֖ח <S%H6795><s%> and fastened בָּאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> it into the ground וְהֽוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> he נִרְדָּ֥ם <S%H7290><s%> for he was fast asleep וַיָּ֖עַף <S%H5774><s%> and weary וַיָּמֹֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> So he died

וְהִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold בָרָק֮ <S%H1301><s%> And behold as Barak רֹדֵ֣ף <S%H7291><s%> pursued אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> סִֽיסְרָא֒ <S%H5516><s%> Sisera וַתֵּצֵ֤א <S%H3318><s%> came out יָעֵל֙ <S%H3278><s%> Jael לִקְרָאת֔וֹ <S%H7125><s%> to meet וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> him and said ל֔וֹ לֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> Come וְאַרְאֶ֔ךָּ <S%H7200><s%> and I will shew אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> thee the man אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whom אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> you מְבַקֵּ֑שׁ <S%H1245><s%> whom thou seekest וַיָּבֹ֣א <S%H935><s%> And when he came אֵלֶ֔יהָ <S%H413><s%> her וְהִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> behold סִֽיסְרָא֙ <S%H5516><s%> into her [tent] behold Sisera נֹפֵ֣ל <S%H5307><s%> lay מֵ֔ת <S%H4191><s%> dead וְהַיָּתֵ֖ד <S%H3489><s%> and the nail בְּרַקָּתֽוֹ׃ <S%H7541><s%> [was] in his temples

וַיַּכְנַ֤ע <S%H3665><s%> subdued אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> So God בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> on that day הַה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> יָבִ֣ין <S%H2985><s%> Jabin מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> the king כְּנָ֑עַן <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> before בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וַתֵּ֜לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> pressed יַ֤ד <S%H3027><s%> And the hand בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel הָל֣וֹךְ <S%H1980><s%> heavier וְקָשָׁ֔ה <S%H7186><s%> and prevailed עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> upon יָבִ֣ין <S%H2985><s%> against Jabin מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> the king כְּנָ֑עַן <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan עַ֚ד <S%H5704><s%> against אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> they הִכְרִ֔יתוּ <S%H3772><s%> until they had destroyed אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> יָבִ֥ין <S%H2985><s%> Jabin מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king כְּנָֽעַן׃ <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan פ
